Package home.inheritance.geometry

Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
home.inheritance.geometry.Polygon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Circle, Triangle
public class Polygon
extends java.lang.Object
This is the parent class which has many subclasses. This exercise is for testing inheritance properties This class contains every field needed for all the geometric shapes implemented in the code
Version:
1.1
Author:
Simon
